info.name: Firefox AppButton - Aero Clean
info.description:
This is a mod of style 44447 by user 82707. I've altered its appearance so that it will work fabulously with style 36813. It can be used without Dryfus' theme, though.

(Most of the code was left intact for troubleshooting purposes. Feel free to tweak it as needed.)

Important!! -- If you're using style 36813, comment out the #appmenu-button related code in the Aero Clean style or there may be conflicts. (This is a really simple task.)

This style will also work with Pale Moon and other Firefox 4 derivatives.
info.additionalInfo:
6/19 - Fixed some glaring mistakes in the code. Much prettier and fits the theme better. Will be making some more modifications in the next few days. . .  

4/12 - Firefox 4 has officially launched. This style is still kicking butt and taking names.

1.7 - Tested in FF4 RC1 with Drifus' FF theme.
* Added unique visual style for "normal" window mode.
* When in "full screen" FF menu button now mimics a tab.

1.6 - All things good in FF4rc1 still.
* Noticed that there was no mouse-over effect for some modes. That has been now corrected.

1.5 - Still working great in FF4rc1.
* Tweaked and cleaned up the code a bit. Added better hover gradients and privacy browsing background.

1.0 - Works great in FF4b12.
